actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.

summary.text: Provides that any person may send any piece of mail matter, not exceeding four ounces in weight, for postage of 1 cent to any Member of the Senate representing the State, and to any Member of the House of Representatives representing the district, in which such person resides, if that person uses a special stamp issued by the Postal Service for such matter. Provides that the Postal Service shall issue special 1-cent stamps to be used in sending such matter, and such stamps shall only be sold at post offices.

titles.title: A bill to authorize reduced postage rates for certain mail matter sent to Members of Congress.
